alert.note: Alert for Northern Acadia; Northern Calcasieu; Northern Jefferson Davis; Southern Calcasieu; Southern Jefferson Davis (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 09 at 8:38PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT JEFFERSON DAVIS...SOUTHWESTERN EVANGELINE...NORTHWESTERN ACADIA...SOUTHEASTERN CALCASIEU AND WEST CENTRAL ST. LANDRY PARISHES THROUGH 930 PM CST... At 837 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Kinder to 6 miles north of Sabine National Wildlife. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake Charles, Sulphur, Eunice, Jennings, Westlake, Welsh, Iowa, Basile, Iota, Elton, Fenton, Hayes, Lake Charles Regional Airport, Moss Bluff, Evangeline, Mowata, Lebleu Settlement, Savoy, Lawtell, and Swords. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 24 and 69. Interstate 210 between mile markers 1 and 12. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Northern Acadia; Northern Calcasieu; Northern Jefferson Davis; Southern Calcasieu; Southern Jefferson Davis
